turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Bill, can you please order a coffee for me from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which store do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Mack Ave. at midtown Detroit.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I know you like Caffè Americano. Do you want to order the same?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I was thinking about Caffè Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size do you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande would be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know, this time I'll try their Almond Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's yummy. What about sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please ask them to add two sugar on the side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, if they can, please ask them to add some honey please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Here is your order - one Grande Caffè Latte with Almond milk and Honey and two sugar on the side.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Please go ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed. It will be ready for pickup in about ten minutes. I already texted you the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
